website_summaries.verdict: The Polk Omni S2 is a well-priced, versatile Play-Fi speaker with decent sound quality, but Sonos' shadow looms large.
pros: The compact Polk Omni S2 is one of the least-expensive Play-Fi multiroom speakers yet
It offers a big soundstage and lots of bass
The speaker sounds even better in stereo mode, and it's easy to set up -- unlike the comparable Yamaha
cons: The Play-Fi app can be a little daunting for beginners
No way to adjust the sound quality -- no EQ, for example -- and it could sound confused with the wrong music
The superior Sonos One is only little more expensive

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste the money!
customer_reviews.text: Worst speaker set ever. I purchased two of these so I could link together and listen to music to our house. They suck! They're constantly going off line, and half the time when I open the app I'm unable to find the speakers connected to the Wi-Fi and have to reset them. Biggest pain in the butt ever! My family member has Sonos I thought this would be a comparable option, I was wrong. Worth the extra money to get Sonos App is not user-friendly at all, and I still can't figure out how to use it through my computer.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker.  Setup could be easier.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Polk speakers since the early 1970's and I have never been disappointed. This speaker sounds great for it's size. Clear mid range and about the right amount of base. No audible distortion even when played loud. It works well with my desk top as well as lap top. The software setup is a bit tricky. The booklet that comes with it tells you to find the software on the Polk web site. They don't have the software there. When I called Polk they directed me phorus.com. That works but it is designed for many different speakers making the setup a bit more difficult than is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: Read my review and ignore the tech unsavy
customer_reviews.text: Ok. Contact tech support.. be patient. Learn how to use these awesome speakers. New tech. Play fi. dload follow inst Tech support was the best I have had ever. I've had these for almost a year still learning. Dload instructions from web. Much more detailed. Great. Remember when polk started. State of the art. Still sounding great. Ausom sound. Ausom tech support
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: the speaker has great sound quality and works flawlessly on it's own
customer_reviews.text: the speaker has great sound quality and works flawlessly on it's own. It has issues staying connected when connected to the speaker and Polk A1 simultaneously, but this issue seems to only occur when I'm listening on Spotify. If I'm streaming straight off my phone or from Pandora, it seems to work as it should. This may be more of an issue with Spotify than the speaker, but that is mainly how I get my music and these to not talk well together when using that app.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Culver

customer_reviews.title: Great product that won't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: This is a near-perfect speaker for casual listening, such as in the kitchen, shop, etc. where more serious audio setups are not practical. I find the bass a little weak for my taste, but otherwise it's a room-filling, satisfying full sound with negligible distortion (to my ears anyway). Performance-wise the Polk Omni 2 is a small notch below the Bose and Denon offerings in the same category, but those are typically $100 more. I bought the plug-in (standard) version, which came at a really good price during the holiday sales, so can't complain about the cost, but I thought the truly wireless (portable) version is a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: ippowus

customer_reviews.title: and I have never been so disappointed in a speaker
customer_reviews.text: I am a lifelong Polk Audio Customer, and I have never been so disappointed in a speaker. The speaker cuts out, loses its wireless connection, makes loud clicking sounds, and I could go on and on. It actually took me 3 months to even complain, thinking I just had not setup something correctly. I hope I just got a defective unit. The other Omni line speakers are not like this at all. I also purchased the Omni P1, and have had not issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Great Polk sound, everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic system. We bought 3 of these, plus the Omni P1 so our main stereo (feeding inside and outside speakers) are all one synchronized system. Great app to control everything (we have a Pandora subscription and usually use that, but also use our own music). It's so great to have and hear music everywhere, without it having to be loud in any one area. One is in the guest/kids' bathroom, which is a great hit for parties, and the kids' shower time. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: These speakers really sound fantastic. Nice full base and excellent range
customer_reviews.text: These speakers really sound fantastic. Nice full base and excellent range. As for the Play-Fi app - I've been using it for for more than a year now and it's come a long way. Not all Play-fi products are created equally - I have more than one vendor in my setup, although I have always preferred Polk for the sound quality. Polk's playfi firmware has always been the most stable and I have had no problems with connectivity or setup. I'm looking forward to the promise alexa integration.
customer_reviews.author: Paulc

customer_reviews.title: easy to use when plugging in directly
customer_reviews.text: easy to use when plugging in directly, but not user friendly to stream with restricted capabilities and very difficult to pair with other speakers and sync as surround sound system.
customer_reviews.author: pgconcord

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Absolute worst. They actually connected 1 time for about 2 weeks. Customer service at Polk is terrible. No one knows what they are doing. Every time you call you get a different answer. We even upgraded our wifi (extra cost) and still nothing. I wish I could return these stupid things. I guess we will spend more money on something that works
customer_reviews.author: lucia ammerata

customer_reviews.title: Won't work as surround sound with Polk SB1
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair of these to work with my Polk SB1 soundbar to give me surround sound 5.1... The problem is that it does NOT work! Apparently you need to have the newer Polk SB1+ in order to make surround sound work. As Stereo Speakers strictly for music, they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Devon H.

customer_reviews.title: tends to drop off, needs resetting all the time ...
customer_reviews.text: tends to drop off, needs resetting all the time. C Gave this to my nephew and replaced it with 2nd gen echo, which works beautifully
customer_reviews.author: roger karlsson

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick-excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker to complete your Polk system for surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jan P.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good.
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Plugs to phone and sounds good. Works for computer as well
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, just can't get them to sync with ...
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, just can't get them to sync with my network and computers to actually work. Included instructions are vague, the app does not provide sufficient enough trouble-shooting and customer service is a dead end.
customer_reviews.author: Chicagoeleven

customer_reviews.title: I am pretty technically oriented
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty technically oriented, and I could not get this product to connect to my wi-fi network properly. It kept dropping off the network, and then the network finally stopped being able to "find" the speaker altogether. Tried to uninstall and reinstall the PC app and had lots of problems. Finally, returned the item. It is a shame because the few times I was able to get it playing - the speaker sounded great. However, after wasting about four hours trying to get things working properly, I just could not afford to spend any more time on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barlowe Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker - Okay Software
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is awesome. It's loud, sound quality is great and it's easy to set up. On the otherhand, the audio app is only okay. It work with songs stored on the device, but has limited streaming services and no ability to play through other music player apps.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Compared to Sonos systems... These are far more reasonable and just as powerful.
customer_reviews.author: RBKernal

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality!! WOW!! I bought a couple of used ones and didn't have much luck with them but this one works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The wifi connection was terrible, couldn't play my Apple playlist (had to use their app), had trouble connecting my phone, couldn't connect my laptop. This product was not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Veliz

customer_reviews.title: Finally, Affordable Wireless speakers (802.11x)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a spare, i have three at home and three at the office. The polk omni s2 works over wifi network (802.11). I can use the smartphone/tablet app to play music throught out my house over my WLAN, I can place the speakers literally anywhere in the house. I can stream media from my own media server, or pandora and they sound fantastic. You can get the pc app with a free licensee when you register the speaker. The pc app allows you to play music to the speakers via PC software - i.e. winamp, itunes, vlc player, windows media player. I have already recommended these to friends and family and they love them too.
customer_reviews.author: G.S.C

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Such a waste of money. The most horrible confirigation. Horrible support.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Get Sonos instead.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible user interface. Constantly losses connection and stops playing. I have Sonos speakers as well and they work flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker, Room for Better Software
customer_reviews.text: This would be a 5-star review if the app was improved, more sources (included Mac computers) could be used and if the EQ could be adjusted. The sound is good (especially with 2, one on either side of the room) but it's a little bass heavy for my taste. The documentation online says there's a utility app which allows you to adjust EQ, but I searched the Android and iOS app stores and could not find it. Overall, a great sounding speaker that's a great alternative to a Sonos Play1 because it is stereo and has a line-in for connect non-WiFi enabled sources.
customer_reviews.author: cmfuzzy

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good when it does play
customer_reviews.text: Confusing to set up. Doesn't stay connected to the wireless network which is a pain. Sounds good when it does play.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T

customer_reviews.title: Omni S2
customer_reviews.text: The Omni S2 is everything we expected. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great....when it works
customer_reviews.text: When this speaker works it is great but that is rare. It cuts out all of the time and needs to be reconnected every 10-15 minutes. I reached out to Polk's customer service and as hard as it is to imagine, they are even worse than the speaker. They suggested that I do a reset on the speaker and that worked for about a day and then went back to getting disconnected. I suggest you spend a bit more and just get a Sonos.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker, the wireless battery does not hold up long, Overall its a good thing to have around.
customer_reviews.author: K Man

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is fine, but my android device can never find them
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is fine, but my android device can never find them. There is mostly something wrong with their app. I have to reset and redo the setup everytime if I want them to work. (I have purchased 3 speakers).
customer_reviews.author: Kevin-EB

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and buy Echo.
customer_reviews.text: I was a rep for this product and I bought into the hype. It is not very useful due to the horrible app they built for it. The amazon echo is a far better product.
customer_reviews.author: BMW

customer_reviews.title: It only works through wifi connection, it does not ...
customer_reviews.text: It only works through wifi connection, it does not work w/ bluetooth. The sound is ok (its not a BOSE!), but its usefull.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Figueiredo

product_meta.title: Polk Audio Omni S2 Compact Wireless Wi-Fi Music Streaming Speaker with Play-Fi (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Give nearly any room The rich, detailed sound It deserves with the Polk Omni S2 wireless speaker use vertically or horizontally DTS Play-Fi technology for Wi-Fi connectivity and product linking/ grouping control all of your music through your phone, tablet or computer through the Polk Omni app ultra-compact size is easy on the eyes in any home environment
feature_bullets: Room filling sound from an ultra-compact speaker. Twin 2” full range drivers and passive bass radiators fill small to medium spaces with amazing audio performance
Use your WiFi network to stream music from your phone, tablet or computer with the Free Polk Omni App. Stream Amazon Prime Music, Pandora, Spotify, iHeartRadio, or your own music collection
Simple Setup. Download the Polk Omni and Utility App, connect the speaker to your network and start playing music
Black and White removable grills included. The S2 fits in with any home décor
Music in every room. Start with one speaker and add music to more rooms with the Polk Omni Collection of speakers. Stream the same music to every room or stream different songs to different rooms

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars132 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
